name: MeloSmash
description:
This game is a Secret Santa Game Jam 2022 submission based on the following letter:

You have 100 floors to conquer.
Smash all watermelons.

This game supports gamepads.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys / WASD / Controller D-Pad / Controller left stick

Move

Spacebar/ Controller B/A/X button (Depends on what controller you use)

Use Hammer
